rules.title: Rules
rules.spin: Just one spin to be awarded
rules.rtp: Doesn’t affect RTP of the game
rules.bet: All play amounts qualify unless a minimum play amount is set
rules.goal: The higher the play amount, the higher the chances of awarding the prize

details.title: All rules of BGaming Promo
details.description: The “{name}” promotion is available for this game and runs from {from} to {to} (“Promotion Deadline”) or until all prizes have been drawn.
details.agreement: By participating in a promotion (as defined below), you hereby agree to abide by these terms and conditions.

summary.title: Promotion "BGaming Drops"
summary.total: The total amount of prizes is {value}.
summary.delay: Award distributions may be delayed up to 72 hours.

conditions.title: How to take part in the "BGaming Drops" promotion
conditions.join: The player needs to join the promotion-related game.
conditions.spin: The player must make at least one spin.
conditions.bet: Any play amount placed on any eligible game may result in a maximum of one random prize from the prize pool during the promotion period.
conditions.player: The number of prizes a player can be awarded is limited only by their total number.
conditions.limit: The number of prizes a single player can be awarded is limited only by the prize pool of the campaign.
conditions.free: Participation in the promotion will not carry any additional value requirements.

general.active_player: You are taking part in the promo!
general.passive_player: You took part in the promo!
general.limit_message:
Spins limit reached.
Further spins won't count

join.title: Paste your invitation code to join the challenge

playerCode.title: Important!
playerCode.message: Each participant is assigned a unique player ID. Please keep your player ID safe and present it to the organizer to verify your identity and participation in the challenge. Without this code, you cannot claim your prize if you award it!

rules.title: Rules
rules.winner: If players have equal highest multipliers, then the one who gets it first wins
rules.id: Changing the coin type will switch your player ID, and your challenge progress will be recorded separately for each player ID
rules.bet: Any play amount level is allowed
rules.spin_denied: The features you have obtained will not be accounted for in the challenge results
rules.spin_feature: Only obtained features will be taken into account for the challenge
rules.spin: Any spin (incl. extra obtainments) counts in the challenge
rules.limit_on: {value} spins per player to get the highest multiplier. You'll be notified when your spins are done

profile.title: Loyalty
profile.telegram_message: Link your Telegram account to earn loyalty points and get awards from BGaming in any operator where you play BGaming games. You need to link Telegram for each coin type you play.
